pr_title: [#3629] - fix regression with load more functionality in datapoints

timeline.bodyText: showLoadMore is already a boolean right? Is the !! needed?
timeline.author: muloem

replies.bodyText: It's not a boolean it's a falsy number (in this case 0)
replies.author: marvinkome

timeline.bodyText: if not to be used then remove it
timeline.author: muloem
